adventure_overview: Some of your favorite building toys are probably modular. Learning to build using modular design is a good way to conserve resources. In this Adventure, you will gain an understanding of modular design, build using modular-based materials, and practice making directions for others to follow. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Learn what modular design is and identify three things that use modular design in their construction.

activities.name: Modular
activities.description: Cub Scouts learn concepts of modular design and construction and it benefits.

requirements.text: Using modular-based building pieces, build a model without a set of instructions.

activities.name: Let’s Build It
activities.description: Using modular based building pieces Cub Scouts build a model.

requirements.text: Using the model made in requirement 2, create a set of step-by-step instructions on how to make your model.

activities.name: Draw It Out
activities.description: Cub Scouts draw instructions on how to make their design structure.

activities.name: Live Action
activities.description: Cub Scouts create video instructions on how to make their design structure.

activities.name: Write It Down
activities.description: Cub Scouts write down instructions on how to make their design structure.

requirements.text: Have someone make your model using your instructions.

activities.name: Following Instructions
activities.description: Cub Scouts follow instructions to build a model.

requirements.text: Using the same modular pieces used in requirement 2, build another model of something different.

activities.name: My Build
activities.description: Cub Scouts design and build a model house of their own imagination or something different.

requirements.text: With your parent or legal guardian’s permission, watch a video demonstrating how something was built using modular design.

activities.name: It’s Real
activities.description: Watch a video of a real-life project that uses modular design.
